short_summary: space rental, lodging and meals services
description: PWGSC, on behalf of DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENCE, is issuing this REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the acquisition of space rental, lodging, and meals services located in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex Statement of Work.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
================INNER LAYOUT TITLES================

### Title
W3934-24B002 Space Rental, Lodging and Meals Services - Request for Proposal

### Tender Details
**Reference Number**: WS4371959518-Doc4372016110
**Solicitation Number**: WS4371959518
**Publication Date**: January 26, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: February 20, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Amendment Date**: February 12, 2024
**Expected Contract Start Date**: April 12, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date**: April 11, 2025

### Procurement Category
The procurement category for this tender is **SRV** (Services) and is categorized under **90111900** in the UNSPSC classification, which refers to **Specialized Accommodation Services**.

### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the application of several international trade agreements, including the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership.

### Regions of Opportunity
There are no regions of opportunity specified for this procurement.

### Regions of Delivery
The required specialized accommodation services will be delivered in **Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu**, Quebec, Canada.

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this procurement is the **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**, with an address of 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada.

### Contact Information
For more information regarding this procurement, please contact Melanie Caty at melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Tender Description
This Request for Proposal seeks to acquire space rental, lodging, and meals services for the Department of National Defence in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, Canada. The successful contractor will be required to provide services as outlined in the Annex Statement of Work. Submissions are expected to be delivered electronically to the email contact above by the closing date and time.

### Notice URL
For a complete version of the request, please access the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18628725?extsite=MTg2Mjg3MjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk
